summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting the second day of an interview with a female victim/witness, conducted on January 20, 2021. The witness provides detailed allegations of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein, describes the presence and actions of Ghislaine Maxwell and other associates, and details her own substance use and the financial transactions involved.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure accused of sexual abuse. The witness describes giving him massages that always ended in his ejaculation, and details various sexual acts he performed on her and others.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as being present in Epstein's home. She commented on the witness's body, touched her breasts, and was involved in scheduling a massage with another man.

persons.name: Sarah
persons.context: Another individual present during massages. She was in the room during the witness's first visit and on other occasions, sometimes massaging Epstein alongside the witness.

persons.name: Maria
persons.context: Another individual present during massages with the witness. She and the witness massaged Epstein in the sauna.

persons.name: Nadia
persons.context: Another individual present during massages. She was in the room with the witness on one to two occasions.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: Present via phone during the FBI interview of the witness.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Present via phone during the FBI interview of the witness.

connections.description: Maxwell was present in Epstein's home, commented on victims, touched them, and helped schedule appointments, indicating a collaborative role in the alleged abuse.
Sarah was present during massages with the witness, including the first time, indicating she was part of the environment around Epstein.
Maria massaged Epstein alongside the witness in the sauna, indicating she was also involved in providing massages.
Nadia was present in the massage room with the witness on occasions.
Both were present in Epstein's home during the witness's visits, part of the same social/operational circle.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim/Witness - Day 2
events.description: The FBI, along with an AUSA and a detective, conducted a second day of interviews with a victim/witness regarding her experiences with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Witness's First Massage with Epstein
events.description: The witness's first visit to massage Epstein, during which she was accompanied by Sarah and observed Epstein having sex with another individual.

events.title: Massage with Epstein's Unidentified Friend
events.description: The witness was scheduled, potentially by Maxwell, to massage a chunky, bald male friend of Epstein's. The massage escalated to sexual acts, and the man paid her extra money.

events.title: Sexual Encounter with Epstein and a Model
events.description: A sexual encounter where Epstein and a female model were present. Epstein tried to penetrate the witness, and the model performed oral sex on her.

keyFacts: The witness, around age 14, disclosed a prior molestation to Jeffrey Epstein during a massage, and he expressed sympathy.
The witness used cocaine before and during massages with Epstein to cope with discomfort, and used the money he paid her to buy drugs.
Every massage with Epstein ended in his ejaculation, and he engaged in escalating sexual contact with the witness, including attempted penetration.
Ghislaine Maxwell was present in the home, touched the witness's breasts, commented on her body, and was involved in scheduling a massage with another man who sexually assaulted the witness.
Other women, including Sarah, Maria, and Nadia, were present during massages, and the witness observed sexual acts between Epstein and other women.
